name: Power to the People (itch)
description:
Connect all the houses to the main power plant as the population grows.

Developed in 3 hours for Trijam #169 with the theme Overpopulation

Click on power plant and then click on a house to connect it to the grid. You can also click and release, or connect houses to other houses

Mouse control

Mouse scroll wheel to zoom

Arrow keys/WASD to pan

Developed in Godot Engine

-Credits

Art and brainstorming by Mutley - https://twitter.com/MutleyArts <- Awesome person, check them out!

Programming by me (Sofox - https://twitter.com/TheSofox )
